meanings.sent1: Reaching the summa of the mountain was a great achievement for the climbers.
meanings.sent2: The sun was at its summa in the sky, shining brightly.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to climb to the summa of the tree but got stuck halfway.
meanings.sent4: Her happiness reached the summa when she received the award.
meanings.sent5: The summa of his excitement was evident in his wide smile.

meanings.sent1: The professor provided a detailed summa of the lecture for the students.
meanings.sent2: The book's back cover had a brief summa of the story to entice readers.
meanings.sent3: The summa of the movie was so well-done that it left the audience satisfied.
meanings.sent4: She wrote a thorough summa of the project to present to her team.
meanings.sent5: The summa of the report highlighted the key findings of the research.

meanings.sent1: The summa of apples in the basket was ten.
meanings.sent2: He calculated the summa of his expenses for the month.
meanings.sent3: The summa of candies in the jar seemed to decrease every day.
meanings.sent4: She was surprised by the summa of money she found in her old jacket.
meanings.sent5: The summa of books on the shelf was impressive, showing his love for reading.
